General.Name: Deluxe Family Co Ltd
General.Description: Deluxe Family Co., Ltd. develops and sells real estate properties in China. It offers villas, shops, and residential buildings. The company is also involved in the building decoration, greening, and environmental protection. In addition, it engages in the equity investment management, industrial investment, and investment consulting and management services. Deluxe Family Co., Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Shanghai, China.

4.Name: Lingsheng  Fang
4.Title: Accounting Officer & Head of Accounting Department
